name: lapzo
headline: Lattice for Latam with personalized learning and development
description: lapzo makes it easy for companies in Latam to develop their workforce, even when they are remote. We allow them to set and track goals, evaluate their performance, and train them with online courses.

founders.name: Santiago Maldonado, Founder
founders.description: Tech enthusiast helping mid-size companies in Latam to close the gap between goals and learning

## ¿Por qué elegirnos como aliados?![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bbfb429eaf728cd08009f8/658de4906f7007cb92fbb757_Vector%201.png)
aliados?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bbfb429eaf728cd08009f8/65ae71cf0c91f2477f21cf01_manos-chocanfo.png)
Formamos parte de tu equipo
Nuestra solución **incorpora diversos tooltips y bases de conocimiento que, en conjunto con nuestro dedicado equipo de Customer Success** , ayudan a tu organización en el logro de los objetivos de negocio.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bbfb429eaf728cd08009f8/65ae71cd027a5dcd361475f0_cohete.png)

### Company Overview: Lapzo

**Name**: Lapzo  
**Founded**: 2018  
**Location**: Monterrey, Mexico  
**Team Size**: 135 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S21  
**Website**: [Lapzo](https://www.lapzo.com)  

### Mission
Lapzo aims to create a “Lattice for Latam,” focusing on personalized learning and development. The company’s mission revolves around empowering Latin American companies to enhance their workforce capabilities.

### Problem Addressed
As businesses increasingly shift to remote models, many struggle to effectively develop their employees. Lapzo steps in to simplify this process by providing tools for goal tracking, performance evaluations, and access to online training courses.

### Solutions Offered
Lapzo’s platform delivers a comprehensive suite of tools tailored for workforce development, which includes:

1. **Competency Development**: Helps improve labor skills through structured feedback and assessments.
   
2. **Corporate University Creation**: Enables companies to craft their own training programs tailored to their specific needs.
   
3. **Evaluations**: A tool for assessing employee performance and translating results into actionable insights.
   
4. **Goal Setting**: Provides alignment across teams to ensure efficiency and shared objectives.

5. **Course Catalog**: Offers over 800 educational courses that focus on skill development, certified by Tecmilenio.

### Clientele and Impact
Lapzo proudly serves over 300 organizations, steadily helping them refine their talent development strategies and boost retention rates. Clients have reported significant improvements in business results and employee potential coupled with reduced turnover.

### Noteworthy Testimonials
- **Hector Hernandez, Cleber**: Emphasized the importance of constant training in the automotive sector, highlighting Lapzo’s effectiveness.
- **Jhonatan Arana, Mazda Mexico**: Acknowledged the swift integration and impact on team updates.
- **Roxana Dalila, Grupo Plaza**: Commended Lapzo as an essential tool for managing organizational knowledge.

### Conclusion
Lapzo has positioned itself as a critical ally for businesses in Latin America striving to elevate their talent development strategies through a straightforward and effective digital platform. Whether it’s through personalized training paths, talent evaluations, or sophisticated goal tracking, Lapzo is set on driving excellence in workforce capabilities.
